queries.query: small chaotic neutral creature that can jump high and squeeze through narrow spaces
queries.variant: chaotic neutral small creature that can squeeze through tight areas and jump really high

queries.query: fey creature known for its rubbery flesh and agility in combat
queries.variant: agile fey creature recognized for its rubbery skin and combat skills

queries.variant: monster that has a lot of dexterity and values mobility instead of strength

queries.query: elusive fey with the ability to change form and attack from a distance
queries.variant: fey creature that can change its shape and attack from afar while being hard to catch

queries.variant: fey creature that can deal thunder damage and has advantages in mobility
